revised_title: Tracing Afferent and Efferent Tracts in the Medulla Oblongata
tldr: The article discusses experimental procedures to understand the origin and destination of afferent and efferent tracts in the medulla oblongata. The author conducted various experiments, including section or destruction of the lateral region of the medulla, and observed the degeneration of different tracts in the spinal cord and cerebellum. The findings provide insights into the complex neural connections and pathways within the medulla oblongata.
